summary: This is an email from July 21, 2021, scheduling a conference call between the FBI's New York office and the UK's Metropolitan Police regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The call is to take place the following day at 10:00 AM in a conference room at 26 Federal Plaza.

events.title: FBI-Metropolitan Police Conference Call on Maxwell Case
events.description: A scheduled conference call between the FBI's New York office (SAC) and the UK's Metropolitan Police to discuss the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

locations: 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY (FBI New York Field Office)
keyFacts: The FBI's New York office was coordinating directly with the UK's Metropolitan Police on the Ghislaine Maxwell case as of July 2021.
A conference call was scheduled for July 22, 2021, at 10:00 AM, indicating ongoing international cooperation in the investigation.
The meeting was to be held in the conference room of the Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) at 26 Federal Plaza, the FBI's New York Field Office.
